SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am45
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am45.model.deck

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am45.model.deck.Deck
All Implemented Interfaces:
MarketListener
public class Deck extends Object implements MarketListener
The Deck class represents the deck of cards in the game and manages the drawing of cards. It implements the MarketListener interface to be able to interact with the Market.

The deck is composed of three stacks of cards: resource cards, gold cards and initial cards, and the information about the cards is extracted from their json file.

      Extract the gold card type of the card from the json file based on the gold type.

      Extract the corner values of the card from the json file.
      Parameters:
      materialValuesArray - the array of the values of the card corners to be extracted from the json file.
